首页 » Travel/Snowbird Insurance » 21st Century Travel Insurance

21st Century Travel Insurance

Save on the travel insurance you need when:

  • booking any trip and travel arrangements
  • travelling on your Christmas or March Break, or during the summer months
  • on an exchange or sabbatical
  • students are studying or travelling abroad
  • travelling on business, holiday, cross-border shopping trips, etc.

You can also save on travel insurance for a family member, friend or associate coming to Canada for a visit, a work assignment or to immigrate.

For Canadians travelling, working or studying outside of their province of residence, we offer:

  • Medicare International Travel Insurance, including:
    • $5,000,000 Emergency Medical Coverage
    • Single Trip and Multi-trip Plans with very competitive rates and terms
    For more information click here to view our online brochure describing the product
  • Trip Cancellation and Interruption Insurance
  • Baggage Loss, Travel Accident and Flight Accident Insurance 
    For more information call 1-800-567-0021.

For Visitors to Canada, we offer:

  • Emergency Medical Insurance with multiple coverage and deductible options
  • Very favourable provisions for pre-existing medical conditions
  • Coverage for en-route travel and excursion trips outside of Canada
    For more information click here to view our online brochure describing the product

Edvantage Offer: 
As an Edvantage member, you are entitled to special premium discounts on all of our products. Your premiums are 10% lower than our regular published rates offered to the general public!

Why Call 21st Century?

You will speak to courteous, professional staff who will assist you in determining the coverage that's right for you. For those who may need to complete a medical questionnaire, we will guide you through the application process. We provide specialized service and reduced rates on a wide range of travel products!

Since 1979, 21st Century Travel Insurance Limited has been doing one thing and doing it well - working to make travel financially secure by offering great insurance products for travelling Canadians and visitors to Canada. That’s over 30 years of helping people with medical emergencies, cancelled and interrupted trips, lost baggage and other stressful situations that can occur while you’re away from home. Let us "answer the call" if an unforeseen event happens to you!
